data.fullContent: On the inside, the TARDIS looks like a giant spaceship, but on the outside it looks like a police telephone box. These telephone boxes were still a common sight in many British cities when the series first began in 1963, but after the walkie-talkie was invented they were no longer needed. They were used by the police as workstations - and people could also use them to call the police.
data.answer: 在里面，塔迪斯看起来像一个巨大的宇宙飞船，但在外面，它看起来像一个警察的电话亭。当1963年这个系列开始的时候，这些电话亭在许多英国城市里仍然很常见，但是在步话机被发明之后，它们就不再被需要了。它们被警察用作工作站——人们也可以用它们来呼叫警察。
